TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Stroke extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 表示单个笔划墨迹。

span.span: Represents a single ink stroke.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是从等触笔或鼠标指针设备收集的数据对象。A is the data object that is collected from a pointing device, such as a tablet pen or a mouse. 可以创建和操作以编程方式，以及可以表示直观地在墨迹启用元素上，如。The can be created and manipulated programmatically, and can be represented visually on an ink-enabled element, such as the . A包含有关其位置和外观的信息。A contains information about both its position and appearance. 属性是集合的指定的位置的对象。The property is a collection of objects that specifies the position of the . 属性指定描边的外观。The property specifies a stroke's appearance.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Transform (System.Windows.Media.Matrix transformMatrix, bool applyToStylusTip);

param.name: transformMatrix
param.span: 定义变换的 对象。

span.span: The object defining the transformation.

param.name: applyToStylusTip
param.span: 如果要将变换应用到触笔的笔尖，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to apply the transformation to the tip of the stylus; otherwise, .

summary.span: 根据指定的 对象执行变换。

span.span: Performs a transformation based upon the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示用于在二维空间中进行转换的 3 x 3 矩阵。The object represents a 3x3 matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space. 通过提供矩阵转换描边对象的每个点。Each point of the Stroke object is transformed by the supplied Matrix. 有关示例的原始的 Point.Y 值为 55，如果原始的 Point.X 值为 100，转换 Matrix.Scale （0.5，0.5）、 新的 Point.X 值为 50，新的 Point.Y 值为 27.5。For example if the original Point.X value is 100, the original Point.Y value is 55, and the transformation Matrix.Scale(0.5, 0.5), the new Point.X value is 50 and the new Point.Y value is 27.5. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将转换对象。The following example demonstrates how to transform a object. [!code-csharp[DrawTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawTransform/CSharp/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DrawTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawTransform/VisualBasic/Module1.vb#1)]
